channel.title: talks on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in talks on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: seminars and talks
item.description: seminars and invited talks A composite indicator for circular economy performance - ISI 2023: International Statistical Institute World Statistics Congress (2023 - Ottawa, Canada) Convex Clustering of Mixed Numerical and Categorical Data - DSSV-ECDA 2023: Joint conference of Data Science, Statistics & Visualisation and the European Conference on Data Analysis (2023 - Antwerp, Belgium) Discussion about Statistical Framework for Measuring the Sustainability of Tourism - SIS 2023: Statistical Learning, Sustainability and Impact Evaluation (2023 - Ancona, Italy)
